resources.string:
"FAQ

" "How to use it?
" "Click Start to count steps, distance traveled, calories burned and duration." "Click Lock to disable the Stop button to avoid accidental pressing of Stop button and Unlock button to enable it." "Click Pause button to pause the counting and play button to resume counting." "You can edit details in settings for better accuracy.

" "Step Count is not accurate?
" "Every person has a different style and way of walking and the accuracy of step counts depends on it." "Try to take a test walk and adjust the Sensitivity of pedometer in settings to increase the accuracy of step counts.

" "Distance traveled is not accurate?
" "Distance traveled is calculated using the step size and step size is automatically calculated with a formula using the " "entered gender and height in the settings. If the calculated step size is not equal to your step size, you can manually " "enter it in the edit text provided and save for more accurate calculation of distance traveled.

" "Count Steps when shaking phone?
" "If you shake your phone, it might be counted as steps because of the built-in sensor it uses.
It's not a bug :)

" "Where and How to place it?
" "Place your phone in your Jeans/Pant pocket in Upward position.

" "How calories and distance is calculated?
" "It uses your height, weight and gender to calculate your burned calories and distance." "So please ensure you input accurate information in the settings.

" "Changes made in Settings are not being reflected?
" "After saving changes in settings, close the app and open it again." "Values will automatically get updated.


" "Happy Walking :)


"
